docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Seeking to capitalize on the growing public belief that nicotine, like tar, is a dangerous component of cigarette smoke, the Philip Morris Companies has developed a cigarette that is nearly free of nicotine.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Seeking to capitalize on the growing public belief that nicotine, like tar, is a dangerous component of cigarette smoke, the Philip Morris Companies has developed a cigarette that is nearly free of nicotine.
